transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hanji sir.
Executive: Hanji sir, google pe type kijiyega sir ek link type kijiyega seller.indiamart.com.
Customer: Aap spelling bol sakte hain?
Executive: Ha ha, main aapka jo spelling hai sir main aapko whatsapp bhi kar deta hu, ek minute.
Customer: 
Executive: 
Customer: Maine bhej diya sir aapko.
Customer: Achcha seller.indiamart.com
Customer: seller.
Customer: dot
Customer: indiamart.com
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Ha ho gaya, abhi open kijiyega use.
Customer: Open kiya isme 10 digit number mang raha hai 89 sir main dal raha hu apna number.
Executive: Number daliye.
Customer: Ke baad maine login kiya fir isme request OTP aaya maine us pe click kiya fir isme four digit wala option to aa gaya par mere phone pe four digit OTP nahi aa raha isi number pe.
Executive: Aapke phone OTP nahi aa raha?
Customer: Nahi sir.
Executive: [inaudible] to ye to aapka network hai na sir proper charge hai na mobile?
Customer: Bilkul sir baat kaise kar raha hu maine aapko call kiya isi number se aapne bhi palat ke mujhe kiya.
Executive: Thoda wait kar lijiye sir ho sakta hai kabhi kuch technical glitch aa raha hoga.
Executive: Aisa hota hai ki kabhi kabhi.
Customer: Kal bhi nahi ho raha tha sir, kal bhi parso bhi nahi ho raha tha.
Customer: OTP aa hi nahi raha.
Customer: Nahi sir OTP nahi aa raha hai na.
Executive: Theek hai main apne end se agar try karke dekhta hu agar.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Number bataiyega sir.
Customer: 8960
Executive: 8 bataiye
Executive: 60
Customer: 7161
Executive: 716199
Customer: 99 ji 99
Executive: Dekhiye main yaha se login kiya hu ek bar check karna gaya ki nahi gaya OTP mat bataiyega sirf check kijiye ki gaya ya nahi gaya.
Customer: Abhi nahi aaya sir.
Executive: Main ne bheja hai sir.
Executive: Wo bol raha hai ki already maine send kar diya hai OTP.
Customer: Aap open ho raha hai sir aap aapka?
Customer: Ji?
Executive: Indiamart ka app open ho raha hai?
Customer: App open app pe phone pe to hum already login hai is pe.
Executive: Login hai na matlab Indiamart ka login hai aapka?
Customer: Phone ke upar login hai mera. Phone ke upar ha matlab phone me jo Indiamart ka app hai wo login hai.
Customer: Ji. Baki system me aap jab login kar rahe hai to OTP nahi aa raha hai.
Customer: Ji. Matlab kuch bhi aur dusra kuch login kar rahe hai to aa raha hai sir OTP mobile pe?
Customer: Nahi sir main kisi bhi product us pe jata hu to yahi khul ke aata hai page to usme phone number likhta hu fir login karta hu fir OTP mangta hai par OTP jo hai aata hi nahi. Main Indiamart main Indiamart ki baat hi nahi kar raha hu main bol raha hu ki kuch bhi aur bhi aur kuch bhi aap login karte hai Indiamart ke alawa kuch bhi bahut sare to OTP aa rahe hai aapke mobile pe?
Customer: Nahi wo to sir koi dikkat nahi hai aap OTP isme har cheez ka aa raha hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi apne message ek bar check kijiye sir message me aapne kuch kiya hoga to OTP jaise dusra registration ho gaya hoga bahut sare aapne payment karte honge to OTP aata hoga ye sab kya aa raha hai message wagera?
Customer: Nahi wo to sab aa raha hai uska koi wo issue nahi hai.
Executive: Tab koi issue nahi hai. Bas Indiamart ka aap ye login kar rahe hai system me to nahi aa raha hai.
Customer: Ha sir kyuki usko usko main login karta hu aata hi nahi ya to mail se aap bata dijiye isme mail wala option hi nahi aata jo main mail se ja ke login karne ke bas phone ka option aata hai.
Executive: Mail ka login nahi aata sir sirf aap phone hi se kar sakte hai. Mail ka hamare paas nahi hai matlab.
Customer: Yahi to problem hai pata nahi aisa to nahi kisi ne koi mere phone ka clone bana liya ho isliye dar lag raha hai.
Executive: To ek kam kijiye sir yaha pe dekhiye waha pe hai na sir waha pe. Hello.
Customer: Ji. Apna app open apna app open kijiyega.
Executive: App agar lag raha hai ki koi dusre ko login aapko aisa lag raha hai aisa login hota to sir OTP kyu nahi aayega sir. OTP to aana chahiye na.
Customer: App pe to main login hu na sir.
Executive: App pe app pe login hai na? Ji kya karte hai fir dekhiyega. A ek bar mobile app me sabse teen line sabse sabse top pe teen line bana hoga.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Us pe click kijiyega niche aa raha hoga sir setting.
Customer: Theek hai. Setting aa raha. Setting pe click kijiyega sir teen dotted line aa raha hoga upar me. Teen dotted line aa raha hoga. Us pe click kijiyega sir waha pe likha hoga sign out from all devices.
Customer: Sign out kar du usse? Sign out from all devices waha pe all devices hoga.
Executive: Do ek sign out hoga ek hoga sign out from all devices.
Customer: Ek minute sir. Matlab ki jaha bhi agar login jaha bhi aapke dusre mobile app me agar login hoga na to wo sara device logout ho jayega.
Executive: Ek minute sir maine jo hai setting pe click kiya. Oh ho. Three dot pe kiya sign out from all device kar diya. Kar diya theek hai.
Customer: Ji. Theek hai sir to fir se agar fir apna sign in kijiyega. Sign in OTP one time verify.
Customer: Abhi to sir OTP please sir excuse.
Customer: Isme bhi ab number aa gaya mera auto login by to call one minute.
Customer: Next.
Customer: Confirm mobile number jab main ok karta hu to is pe likh ke aa jata hai ki to low OTP request from mobile please try after 60 minutes. 60 minutes. 60 minutes. Ji. Number wo kar diya na teen char bar aapne kar diya hoga isiliye ek ghante ke baad bol raha hai. Achcha. Teen char bar aapne attempt kar liya na to lock kar diya bola ki ek ghante baad aapka login hoga. To isme is tarah ab ek ghante me kar lijiyega kyuki aapne yaha pe try kar liya waha pe try kar liya. Achcha. Ek bar mobile mobile me kar lijiyega na yaha se bhi aapne kar diya warna main yahi se baith ke kuch kar raha tha kam. Are kya dikkat hai main wahi main to OTP check kar raha tha na sir aap bol rahe the ki nahi hai. Hum to OTP check kar rahe the aapke yaha pe mobile me aa raha hai ya nahi aa raha hai. Aap bol rahe the kisi dusre ne le liya to ho sakta hai ki kisi dusre ne agar login login kar liya hoga to waha se logout ho jayega logout karte hai na to sara jo bhi aapke mobile kisi dusre ne login kiya hai na wo sara logout ho jayega aapka. Achcha. Isiliye to maine all devices karwaaya na sir aapka. Maan lijiye kisi ko galati se aapne kisi ko marketing person hua kisi ne login kar liya aapka. Ji ji. Aap kaise usko kaise usko logout karwaiyega ek hi option hai aapke paas wo sare device ko logout kar dijiye. Theek hai sir. To aapke maine aapke benefit ke liye to karwaaya na sir. Theek kiya sir main dekhta hu ek ghante baad isko theek hai. Ek ghante baad kijiyega agar kuch problem aata hai to fir mujhe call kijiyega theek hai. Okay sir thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving OTP for login.

- Customer suspects phone clone due to login issues.



Resolution:

- Executive sent the login link on WhatsApp.

- Executive had customer sign out from all devices.

- Executive explained the reason for the delay.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will try logging in after an hour.

- Customer can call back if the issue persists.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- otp, login, indiamart app, sign out, devices
